item.description:
We just had a popular dinner at this restaurant, but member Betsy suggested this fun event.

RESERVATIONS FOR THIS EVENT MUST BE MADE BY 4/27!!!

Costa del Sol Restaurant
IN CONJUNCTION WITH
Manchester Wine & Liquors

PRESENTS A Private
Paella and Wine Tasting

Walk around and enjoy up to 10 wines from Chile & Argentina along with :
Jose Luis Lavin of Cono Sur Vineyards, Chile and Edgardo Del Popolo, Winemaker of Dona Paula Vineyards, Argentina

$40.00 PER PERSON (all inclusive)

Tickets will be sold for this event and can be purchased at Manchester Wine & Liquors. Due to limited seating and demand for this event, there is a 4 ticket limit (Betsy will get 4 tickets, and if more people want to go, someone else will have to purchase more).

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Paella and Wine Tasting at Costa Del Sol
